name: bodyblock-conversion
description: ANVA bodyblock omzetten naar excel files / gewenst fo notatie

scripts.fo-pakbd: npm run compile && node lib/src/bin/index.js -i formulieren/clean.xlsx -o formulieren/pakbd/pakbd.xlsx -d formulieren/pakbd
scripts.fo-to-json-pakbd: npm run compile && node lib/src/bin/fo-to-json.js -f formulieren/pakbd/pakbd.xlsx
scripts.fo-pol16-1000: npm run compile && node lib/src/bin/index.js -i formulieren/clean.xlsx -o formulieren/pol16/01000/pol16.01000.xlsx -d formulieren/pol16/01000
scripts.fo-to-json-pol16-1000: npm run compile && node lib/src/bin/fo-to-json.js -f formulieren/pol16/01000/pol16.01000.xlsx
scripts.fo-pol16-2000: npm run compile && node lib/src/bin/index.js -i formulieren/clean.xlsx -o formulieren/pol16/02000/pol16.02000.xlsx -d formulieren/pol16/02000
scripts.fo-to-json-pol16-2000: npm run compile && node lib/src/bin/fo-to-json.js -f formulieren/pol16/02000/pol16.02000.xlsx
scripts.fo-pol16-3000: npm run compile && node lib/src/bin/index.js -i formulieren/clean.xlsx -o formulieren/pol16/03000/pol16.03000.xlsx -d formulieren/pol16/03000
scripts.fo-to-json-pol16-3000: npm run compile && node lib/src/bin/fo-to-json.js -f formulieren/pol16/03000/pol16.03000.xlsx
scripts.fo-pol16-5000: npm run compile && node lib/src/bin/index.js -i formulieren/clean.xlsx -o formulieren/pol16/05000/pol16.05000.xlsx -d formulieren/pol16/05000
scripts.fo-to-json-pol16-5000: npm run compile && node lib/src/bin/fo-to-json.js -f formulieren/pol16/05000/pol16.05000.xlsx

author: Jelte Dirks
